title: Getting Started with nitratoR
text: nitratoR package provides tidy monthly data three NEON stream sites (Arikaree, Caribou, Lewis Run) 12 months 2023, including two variables water quality, surface water temperature nitrate level. includes: nitrate_tidy: monthly nitrate concentrations (Âµmol/L) temp_tidy: monthly surface-water temperature (Â°C) helper function monthly_median() Shiny dashboard (launch_app()) interactive exploration

title: Getting Started with nitratoR

what: Quick function to get a single-site figure of nitrate level or water temperature
title: Getting Started with nitratoR
text: function returns median nitrate concentration given site month.

title: Getting Started with nitratoR
text: can visually explore datasets interactively using built-Shiny dashboard: app lets choose datasets sites, view boxplots, explore patterns.

title: The relationship between Nitrate and Water temperature
text: Explore NEON Data nitrate level water temperature 3 different rivers US 12 months (2023) Tidy datasets â€¢ Interactive Shiny App â€¢ Reproducible workflow nitratoR package provides clean ready--use water-quality data three NEON stream sites â€” Arikaree (ARIK), Caribou (CARI), Lewis Run (LEWI) â€” collected 2023. includes: nitrate_tidy: monthly nitrate concentrations (Âµmol/L) temp_tidy: monthly surface-water temperatures (Â°C) monthly_median(): simple helper extract site-month median launch_app(): interactive Shiny dashboard explore patterns visually package created learning communication purposes â€” showing build, document, deploy R package integrated data, functions, Shiny app.

Launch the nitratoR Shiny app â€” launch_app
text: Runs Shiny app; R object returned.

title: Launch the nitratoR Shiny app â€” launch_app

what: Monthly median for a selected site and month â€” monthly_median
title: Monthly median for a selected site and month â€” monthly_median
text: Returns median numeric column dataset like nitrate_tidy temp_tidy specific site month.

title: Monthly median for a selected site and month â€” monthly_median
Monthly median for a selected site and month â€” monthly_median
text: data tibble data frame (e.g. nitrate_tidy temp_tidy). site Site code filter (e.g. "LEWI", "ARIK", "CARI"). month Month label filter (e.g. "Jan", "Feb", ... "Dec"). value Name numeric column summarise (default = surfWaterNitrateMean).

title: Monthly median for a selected site and month â€” monthly_median
text: single numeric value (median) NA matching data.

title: Monthly median for a selected site and month â€” monthly_median
code: # Median nitrate for LEWI in January monthly_median(nitrate_tidy, "LEWI", "Jan", surfWaterNitrateMean) #> [1] 207.7  # Median temperature for LEWI in January monthly_median(temp_tidy, "LEWI", "Jan", surfWaterTempMean) #> [1] 7.424

what: Monthly nitrate by site (2023) â€” nitrate_tidy
title: Monthly nitrate by site (2023) â€” nitrate_tidy
text: measurements Nitrate (NO3-N) surface water 15 minute intervals, units micromoles per liter labelled site month three NEON streams. Values means NEON WAQ product; months ordered Janâ€“Dec.

title: Monthly nitrate by site (2023) â€” nitrate_tidy
Monthly nitrate by site (2023) â€” nitrate_tidy
text: tibble columns: site Factor; NEON site code: ARIK, CARI, LEWI month Ordered factor; Jan, Feb, â€¦, Dec surfWaterNitrateMean Numeric; nitrate concentration (Âµmol/L)

title: Monthly nitrate by site (2023) â€” nitrate_tidy
text: Constructed NEON downloads (2023) tidied educational purpose NEON (National Ecological Observatory Network). Nitrate surface water (DP1.20033.001), RELEASE-2025. https://doi.org/10.48443/wwa3-p420. Dataset accessed https://data.neonscience.org/data-products/DP1.20033.001/RELEASE-2025 October 21, 2025.

title: Monthly nitrate by site (2023) â€” nitrate_tidy
code: dplyr::glimpse(nitrate_tidy) #> Rows: 105,120 #> Columns: 3 #> $ site                 <chr> "LEWI", "LEWI", "LEWI", "LEWI", "LEWI", "LEWI", "â€¦ #> $ month                <chr> "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", â€¦ #> $ surfWaterNitrateMean <dbl> 209.6, 209.6, 209.0, 209.3, 209.0, 208.5, 208.9, â€¦

title: Monthly surface water temperature by site (2023) â€” temp_tidy
text: measurements Surface water temperature, available thirty-minute averages, measured platinum resistance thermometer sensor location labelled site month three NEON streams. Values means NEON WAQ product; months ordered Janâ€“Dec.

Dataset accessed https://data.neonscience.org/data-products/DP1.20053.001/RELEASE-2025 October 21, 2025.

code: dplyr::glimpse(temp_tidy) #> Rows: 52,560 #> Columns: 3 #> $ site              <chr> "LEWI", "LEWI", "LEWI", "LEWI", "LEWI", "LEWI", "LEWâ€¦ #> $ month             <chr> "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", "Jan", "Jaâ€¦ #> $ surfWaterTempMean <dbl> 9.987, 9.987, 9.991, 9.976, 9.938, 9.817, 9.665, 9.2â€¦
